relation: The ID assigned to the job instance. The jobInstanceID is a string of integers.

The proprietary token string generated for the user by the BI Publisher server. With the bipSessionToken string, the user no longer needs to provide user credentials. The BI Publisher server can validate this token string and restore the BI Publisher server session to perform needed operation.

textBeforeTable: Table 3-22 Parameters for getScheduledJobInfoInSession() Method JobDetail getScheduledJobInfoInSession(String jobInstanceID, String bipSessionToken); Signature For more information about in-session methods, see Section 1.2, "About In-Session Methods." Returns a JobDetail object that provides the details for the job that's associated with a given jobInstanceID and the bipSessionToken of a given user. 3.22 getScheduledJobInfoInSession() Method Specifies the password for the user name. String password Specifies the BI Publisher user name. textAfterTable: 3.23 getScheduledReportDeliveryInfo() Method Use the getScheduledReportdeliveryInfo() method to retrieve information about the delivery of a scheduled job output. For each scheduled Job, it could have multiple outputIDs. For each outputID, there could be multiple delivery info. See Section 2.3.35, "JobOutputDeliverysList." Signature JobOutputDeliverysList getScheduledReportDeliveryInfo(String jobOutputID, String userID, String password); Table 3-23 Parameters for getScheduledReportDeliveryInfo() Method Parameter Description String jobOutputID The ID assigned to the output of the job for which you want information. The jobOutputID is a string of integers. String userID Specifies the BI Publisher user name.
